title: Using Google Analytics With Ionic Framework
description:
Apple and Google donâ€™t offer much in terms of analytics after an app has been downloaded. Google will take it a step further than Apple and show how many devices have the app installed rather than just downloads, but nothing in terms of usage. To use Google Analytics with Ionic Framework, not much is required.

There is a convenient plugin created for Apache Cordova by Dan Wilson called simply Google Analytics Plugin. With a bit of adjusting we can easily use it with AngularJS.
